name: non-dutch
description: We as developers like Chuck Norris jokes. Therefor we created the following assignment to test your Frontend skills/ knowledge. Please create a git repo (can be local) before you start this assignment. When committing please give a proper description to explain your choices. It should only run in chrome (so you can use es6). Please don't use any boilerplates. You can/may use any framework/lib you want. When finished send a link or send your folder(zip).
author: Mihai Mijea <mijeamihai@yahoo.com> (http://mijeamihai.com/)
